en.add_head_tail:
Add two empty sync map fragments,
one at the begin and one at the end of the sync map,
corresponding to the head and the tail
en.aeneas_path_unset: Path to the Aeneas binary is unset. Please update it in the settings page
en.aeneas_win_path: Path to aeneas Python binary(Usually in C:/Python27)
en.aeneas_unavailable: The Aeneas binary is not available or executable
en.cancel_task_desc: Are you sure you wish to cancel the current task and reset all parameters to defaults?
en.custom_language_unselected: Language for file to be uploaded has to be selected
en.custom_language_saved: Custom Language File has been saved
en.custom_language_invalid: Invalid filename for language code '{language}'. Should be named '{json_file}'
en.custom_language_deleted: Custom translation for language code '{language}' has been deleted
en.hidden_head_tail: Do not output sync map fragments for the head and tail
en.invalid_field: Ensure that all task parameters are set to valid values
en.invalid_filepath: You should select a file with full path
en.is_audio_file: Input Audio File OR Youtube URL
en.is_audio_file_tail_length: Seconds to skip from end of file
en.is_text_type: The format of the input text file
en.is_text_file_ignore_regex: Regex to match text to be ignored for alignment purposes
en.is_text_munparsed_l1_id_regex: Regex to match 'ID' attributes for L1 Multi-line unparsed text fragments
en.is_text_unparsed_class_regex: Regex to match 'class' attributes for Unparsed text fragments
en.is_text_unparsed_id_regex: Regex to match 'id' attributes for Unparsed text fragments
en.os_task_file_head_tail_format: Format of head and tail for text file output
en.os_task_file_id_regex: Regex to be used for output text fragment identifiers
en.stretch_head_tail:
Set the 'begin' attribute of the first sync map fragment to `0`,
 and the `end` attribute of the last sync map fragment to 
the length of the audio file
en.task_adjust_boundary_nonspeech_min: Create a new sync map fragment for each nonspeech interval with this duration
en.task_custom_id: The custom, human-readable identifier of a task
en.task_errors_desc: Aeneas has returned with errors shown below while processing '{filename}'. You can try clicking 'Cancel Task' to reset task parameters to default to fix this
en.task_pip: Aeneas has a missing python module
en.task_pip_desc: The application will attempt to download & install missing python modules for aeneas due to errors while processing '{filename}'
en.task_pip_installed_desc: Missing python modules found while processing '{filename}' have been installed. Please try processing the file once again
